resources.title: Useful Tips
resources.description: Sometimes people ask me for tips about building a dating app profile, I'm not a pro, but few things that helped me was underestanding a bit men mentality and myself and what I want. I try to reflect that as much as I can and then I look for people who reflect similar things.

resources.title: Boundaries
resources.description: Understandig what is acceptable for you is extremely important, it doesn't matter if is in a simple conversation via text or in a date. If something doesn't feels or sit right witho then it doesnt! I always speak up, and if the other person doesn't understand...blocking is free!

resources.title: Expectations
resources.description: This actually the hardest part for me, I generally have very high expectations about what I want on a man. When I was younger I used to tell myself to lower my expectations, but this days I refuse to do that. I'm very happy sigle, so if someone is going to come into my life, is to add to my happiness, not to take it away.

resources.title: Help!
resources.description: Do not hesitate to ask for help if you feel lost, depressed or even in danger. Call a friend, find professional help, or go to the city police or social organizations for women. Here is some useful links:
